alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:41PM CST until January 08 at 9:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Patchy Freezing Drizzle Possible Southeast this Evening... Areas of drizzle or freezing drizzle are expected to develop across portions of southeast Iowa this evening before ending before midnight. This may produce a light glaze, mainly on bridges and elevated surfaces. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Patchy freezing drizzle expected. * WHERE...Much of southeastern Iowa. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening, mainly after sunset. * IMPACTS...Slippery bridges and sidewalks are possible, with light icing on elevated surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog may also reduce visibilities on top of the slippery conditions. Please take it slow and use extra caution out on the roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 5 1 1 app or dial 5 1 1.
